nodes.text: Tallaan spacedock #473B was part of the Tallaani Shipyards. The Herglic Knumai met with independent spacers at the spacedock, under the guise of a regular cargo transfer. Knumai supplied the spaces with five transcubes of equipment provided to them by House Cadriaan for a mission to infiltrate the Vor-cal Feast aboard the House Melantha Orbital Hunting Lodge over Vycinyth.
